name: HomegearNodeBase::invokeNodeMethod
description: This method is only available within a Node-BLUE node. It invokes a method defined within another node (except simple PHP and Python nodes) and can therefore be used for inter-node communication. This is especially required for a node to communicate with configuration nodes.
signatures: mixed invokeNodeMethod(string nodeId, string methodName, array parameters [, bool wait = true])

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the node to call the method in.

parameters.name: methodName
parameters.description: The name of the method to call.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: An indexed array with the parameters to pass to the method.

parameters.name: wait
parameters.description: Wait for method to return value. Set this to false if the return value is not needed. This saves a lot of resources.

returnValue: Returns the method's return value on success.
